EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_ Ensuring Cloud Native Success: Organization Transformation_Q415.
EmailTemplate.subject: Check out the replay - Organization Transformation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We know you weren't able join us on Tuesday for our webinar and wanted to let you know that the on demand replay <[[http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-organization-transformation]]> is now available. Cot√© profiled the third most common journey that our Pivotal Cloud Foundry customers undertake: organization transformation. We looked at what an IT department that has transformed into a Cloud Native enterprise looks like and how it got there. We covered:
- The fundamental importance of culture and change - How and what IT is doing to support the business - How to program the meatware to effectively run inside a Cloud Native organization
Check out the replay <[[http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-organization-transformation]]> and slides <[[http://www.slideshare.net/slideshow/embed_code/key/lFb81VFv2i1hy5]]>, share with your colleagues and think about whether your organization is on the right track to transformation. Send us an email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> to have a deeper conversation about how Pivotal can help you in your journey to become Cloud Native.
See you at our next session,
The Pivotal Team
